newsitem.title: CHINA: China Hunan Investment Co takes on forex business.
newsitem.headline: China Hunan Investment Co takes on forex business.

text.p: China has approved the Hunan Trust & Investment Co to conduct foreign exchange business, the Financial News said on Tuesday in a notice published by the State Administration of Exchange Control.
The administration decided last month to allow the trust firm to handle foreign exchange deposits, extending loans and investment, it said.
The company, based in Changsha, capital of central Hunan province, could also deal with foreign currency borrowing, provision and investment, it said.
